user.title: KeePassXC OTP Setup
user.description:
Please place your KeePassXC database and keyfile in:

**{storage_path}/**

Then enter the filenames below.

⚠️ **Warning:** Files will be securely deleted after import!

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure KeePassXC OTP
reconfigure.description:
Update your OTP entries by uploading a new database.

Place your updated KeePassXC database and keyfile in:

**{storage_path}/**

⚠️ **This will:**
- Remove all existing OTP entities
- Extract new OTP entries from the database
- Create new entities
- Securely delete the uploaded files

✅ **Entity history will be preserved if entity names match**
